high.name: Meningitis
high.description: Headache with fever and neurological symptoms can indicate meningitis, which requires urgent care.

high.name: Severe Viral Infection
high.description: High fever and systemic symptoms may suggest a serious viral illness.

moderate.name: Viral Infection (e.g., Influenza)
moderate.description: Common cause of headache, fever, and fatigue.

moderate.name: Bacterial Sinusitis
moderate.description: Headache combined with fever could indicate a sinus infection.

low.name: Common Cold
low.description: Mild symptoms like cough, sore throat, and runny nose.

low.name: Tension Headache
low.description: Stress-related headaches with mild systemic symptoms.
